snippet: A bill to create domestic partnerships, introduced by State Representative Cathy Connolly, advanced further than anything like it in state history.
abstract: Supreme Court rulings hailed as victories for same-sex marriage did little to change existence of gay couples in Wyoming, where life can be a delicate balance for members of gay community; bill to create domestic partnerships, introduced by State Rep Cathy Connolly, advanced further than anything like it in state history but was ultimately defeated.
lead_paragraph: A bill to create domestic partnerships, introduced by State Representative Cathy Connolly, advanced further than anything like it in state history.

headline.main: In Conservative Wyoming, Signs of a Thaw on Same-Sex Marriage
headline.print_headline: In Conservative Wyoming, Signs Of a Thaw on Same-Sex Marriage

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
